cause.description:
OnFebruary 28th 2007, a young girl passed away of a childhood sickness. We would like to raise money to help children like her who suffer from a virus. We will be starting a walk-a-thon to raise money and this page will help as well. Please donate to help us reach our goal!
1. Event Volunteer
2. Donator
3. Participator
cause.name: Trinidy Weeks Walk-a-Thon
